root.name: List Remove

example.code: inventory = ["lamp", "skeleton key", "mystic orb"] println(inventory) # Prints ["lamp", "skeleton key", "mystic orb"] inventory.remove("skeleton key") println(inventory) # Prints ["lamp", "mystic orb"]

root.description: Removes the given item from the list. Raises a ValueError exception if the item isn't found.

parameter.label: a
parameter.description: List from which to remove an item.
